topic.title: HP Helion OpenStack Carrier Grade 2.1 Beta: Step 6 - Deploying the KVM Region in a Denver Deployment

section.p: After the lifecycle manager is up and running and HP Helion OpenStack is installed, use the following steps to deploy the KVM region.

The process for installing the KVM region involves the following tasks:
Step 1: Bring Up Controller-0 in the KVM Region
Step 2: Deploy the KVM Region Custom Patch
Step 3: Configure the KVM region cloud
Step 4: Configure and unlock the compute controllers
Step 5: Deploy the Horizon Patch

section.title: Step 1: Bring Up Controller-0 in the KVM Region

ol.li: Make sure the server you will use for controller-0 is powered on and the other servers to be used in KVM region are shutdown.
Launch the iLO interface for the server.
Execute the following command to use the bootimage_avs_only.iso to boot the controller node.mount bootimage_avs_only.iso

Follow the install wizard. Select the Graphics mode for the controller only. Do not select Controller+Compute.
